name: Cake Mania 2
description: First, she re-opened the Evans Bakery. Then she sent her grandparents on an exotic Hawaiian cruise. Now, Jill returns in a fantastic all-new cake-baking adventure! Help Jill’s college friend run her posh rooftop bakery, rescue her old flame in his underwater theme park, or wind up in 4 other far-flung bakery locations, each with its own unique layout! Will Jill strive for fame, fortune, maybe even love? In Cake Mania 2, you decide which path Jill pursues, with each choice leading to new baking challenges and dilemmas in this fast-paced culinary crisis for the Nintendo DS.
